description: Try our easy to follow Pineapple & White Rum Sodas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pineapple & White Rum Sodas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar, water, lemongrass and lime leaves in a small saucepan over a medium heat. Stir until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil. Simmer for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and stand allowing flavours to infuse. Strain mixture through a fine sieve.

Pour mixture into the bowl of a food processor. Cut pineapple into quarters, remove core and roughly chop. Add to processor. Process mixture until pineapple is finely chopped. Strain through a fine sieve over a bowl.
Combine strained pineapple juice, rum and mineral water in large jugs. Add ice and mint. Garnish with grilled pineapple and serve immediately.
